tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_content_creators (
    creator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    creator_name VARCHAR(100),
    creator_email VARCHAR(100),
    project_id UUID,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_creator_id UUID REFERENCES augmented_reality_creators(creator_id),
    project_description TEXT,
    project_creation_date DATE NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE creators (    creator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    creator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),    timezone VARCHAR(50) )

CREATE TABLE projects (    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    project_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,    creator_id UUID REFERENCES creators(creator_id),    project_description TEXT,    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() )

CREATE TABLE content (    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    creator_id UUID REFERENCES creators(creator_id),    project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id),    content_type VARCHAR(50),    content_url TEXT,    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() )
CREATE TABLE tags (    tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    tag_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE )

CREATE TABLE ARProjects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    creator_id UUID REFERENCES ARCreators(creator_id),
    project_description VARCHAR(255),
    project_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ARAssets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES ARProjects(project_id),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_url TEXT NOT NULL
);
